DICE_TRAY.settings.enableDiceTray.name: Enable Dice Tray
DICE_TRAY.settings.enableDiceTray.hint: Enable showing a dice tray below the chat message area (requires reload).
Enable showing a dice calculator dialog when clicking the d20 icon near the chat box (requires reload).
DICE_TRAY.settings.enableExtraDiceInSwad: Include d20 and d100 in SWADE
Enable showing d20 and d100 dice buttons in SWADE (requires 'Enable Dice Tray' reload).
DICE_TRAY.settings.enableD6Pips.name: Enable d6 Pips
DICE_TRAY.settings.enableD6Pips.hint: Enables using an alternate d6 icon that includes pips on the die (requires reload).
DICE_TRAY.settings.systemOverride.name: Override system
DICE_TRAY.settings.systemOverride.hint: Override the system used by the dice tray, such as using the dnd5e dice tray which includes advantage and disadvantage buttons.
